channel.title: Power (TV) on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Power (TV) on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Reasonable Doubt’ Creator Talks Season 3 Premiere and Future Plans for the Series
item.description: Raamla Mohamed also chats with THR about Morris Chestnut’s return, adding Joseph Sikora to the cast and auditioning guest stars Lori Harvey and Kordell Beckham.

item.title: ‘Reasonable Doubt’ Creator Talks Season 3 Premiere and Future Plans for the Series
item.description: Raamla Mohamed also chats with THR about Morris Chestnut’s return, adding Joseph Sikora to the cast and auditioning guest stars Lori Harvey and Kordell Beckham.

item.title: ‘Power’ Prequel Focused on Ghost and Tommy Greenlit at Starz
item.description: MeKai Curtis will reprise his role as (young) Kanan Stark.
